title: Longhorns Daily News : Texas AD on open USC job :  I have no interest in any other job
body_text:
Texas Longhorns athletic director Chris Del Conte has become a fixture in Texas athletics culture. That’s look to remain the case for a long time coming, too, as Del Conte recently spoke up about his lack of interest in the newly available USC Trojans athletic director job.
Longhorns Daily News: Texas AD on open USC job: ‘I have no interest in any other job’
Plus: The Super Regionals are set, y’all
“I have no interest in any other job,” Del Conte said, per the Austin American-Statesman. “Who you work for matters. I work for an incredible president [Jay Hartzell] who is taking Texas to new heights. I’m blessed to be here.”
